snippet.title: Towers RTS Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist it now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1673670/Towers/

TowersRTS is a 2.5D real time strategy game (RTS). In this free to play game you will be able to play a story in singleplayer. Or try your luck online versus other people in the normal gamemode as well as special gamemodes like Battle royale. Your Hero will give your army the strength to win!
This game is still in development and will be released soon. If you want to stay updated with the progress you can follow us here on youtube and also on these platforms:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/RtsTowers
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/towersrts/
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/towersdev
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/DCUFcWkCmv

We would love to hear your opinion or to answer all your questions.
Towers will be available on steam and android. IOS will follow soon!
